etymology.description: Pictogram (象形) of flowing water; compare 水, 巛, and 𡿧.
etymology.interpretation: Depicts stream channels with simple strokes suggesting the flow of water. Related forms like 巛 and 水 reflect the same water concept in different graphic traditions and scripts.

examples.chinese: 這裡的山川風光壯麗(这里的山川风光壮丽)。
examples.english: The mountain-and-river scenery here is magnificent.

examples.chinese: 這條冰川正在加速消融(这条冰川正在加速消融)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè tiáo bīngchuān zhèngzài jiāsù xiāoróng.

examples.chinese: 節日裡街上人流川流不息(节日里街上人流川流不息)。
examples.pinyin: Jiérì lǐ jiē shàng rénliú chuānliú bùxī.
examples.english: During the festival, the crowds on the streets flow without end.
